metadata.synopsis: Paladin players breaks their oath and reacts to it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Have a paladin in your party and select it.2. oe MakeOathbreaker

0.speaker: Player
0.text: What's this? Feels like I've lost something...

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I know that feeling. My oath is forsaken once more.
1.context: NodeContext: Karlach: A little sad/ frustrated
